quoteText:
If you are the owner of a copyrighted work and believe your rights under U.S.
copyright law have been infringed by any material on the Comcast Web Services, you may take advantage of certain provisions of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (the "DMCA") by sending Comcast's authorized agent a notification of claimed infringement that satisfies the requirements of the DMCA.
title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

tosdr.case: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
